long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simplify your Black Ops 6 2XP code redemption process with AutoCodes Call of 2XP! This handy extension lets you quickly enter and redeem multiple 2XP codes with a single click, saving you time and effort.

Features:

üî• Batch Code Entry: Easily enter and submit multiple codes at once, separated by commas or spaces.
üöÄ Automated Process: Automatically submits each code and reloads the page, allowing you to focus on gameplay.
üí° Real-Time Tracking: Track the remaining codes to see how many are left in your list.
‚òï Support the Developer: Love the extension? Show your support with a "Buy Me a Drink" button to contribute to future updates!
How to Use:

Open the extension and enter your 2XP codes, separated by commas or spaces.
Click ‚ÄúSend 2XP Codes‚Äù to start the automated process.
Sit back and watch as each code is redeemed for you!
Use the "Stop" button to halt the process at any time.
Whether you're grinding in Black Ops 6 or leveling up in the latest Call of Duty universe, AutoCodes Call of 2XP helps you stay focused on the action by handling the repetitive code entry for you. Download now and streamline your Black Ops 6 experience!

If you enjoy the extension and want to support future updates, consider a small contribution on PayPal (@AlexisAmzDcrz) or follow me on Instagram @alexisamz. Every bit helps, and I appreciate your support!
